pages.text: hamane aakaash mein raashi-chakr banaaye hain aur use dekhane vaalon ke lie susajjit kiya hai
aur use pratyek dhikkaare hue shaitaan se surakshit kiya hai
parantu jo (shaitaan) choree se sunana chaahe, to ek khulee jvaala usaka peechha karatee[1] hai
aur hamane dharatee ko phailaaya aur usamen parvat bana diye aur usamen hamane pratyek uchit cheezen ugaayeen
aur hamane usamen tumhaare lie jeevan ke sansaadhan bana diye tatha unake lie jinake jeevika daata tum nahin ho
aur koee cheez aisee nahin hai, jisake kosh hamaare paas na hon aur ham use ek nishchit maatra hee mein utaarate hain
aur hamane jalabharee vaayuon ko bheja, phir aakaash se jal barasaaya aur use tumhen pilaaya tatha tum usake koshaadhikaaree nahin ho
tatha ham hee jeevan dete tatha maarate hain aur ham hee sabake uttaraadhikaaree hain
tatha tumamen se vigat logon ko jaanate hain aur bhavishy ke logon ko bhee jaanate hain
aur vaastav, mein aapaka paalanahaar hee unhen ekatr karega[1], nishchay vah sab gun aur sab kuchh jaanane vaala hai
aur hamane manushy ko sade hue keechad ke sookhe gaare banaaya
aur isase pahale jinnon ko hamane agni kee jvaala se paida kiya
aur (yaad karo) jab aapake paalanahaar ne farishton se kahaah main ek manushy utpann karane vaala hoon, sade hue keechad ke sookhe gaare se
to jab main use poora bana loon aur usamen apanee aatma phoonk doon, to usake lie sajde mein gir jaana
atah unasab farishton ne sajda kiya
iblees ke siva. usane sajda karane vaalon ka saath dene se inkaar kar diya
